title: Spring in shape of circle inside magnetic field

content.question: A metal spring has its ends attached so that it forms a circle. It is placed in a uniform magnetic field, as shown above. Which of the following will NOT cause a current to be induced in the spring?

choices.label: Changing the magnitude of the magnetic field
Increasing the diameter of the circle by stretching the spring
Rotating the spring about a diameter
Moving the spring parallel to the magnetic field
Moving the spring in and out of the magnetic field

content.answer: Moving the spring parallel to the magnetic field

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
